item.description:
<p> </p>
<p>THERE MAY BE A $9 CHARGE AT THE PARK.  OTHER STATE PARKS HAVE STARTED CHARGING A SUMMER FEE.  PLEASE BE AWARE OF THIS.</p>
<p> </p>
<p>Thanks Pat and Todd for this idea!! They will be leading us on our adventure!
Our hike this weekend will be: Gay City State Park in Hebron. This extensive trail system is maintained in cooperation with the Connecticut Forest and Park Association, and is a great place to hike with our dogs.
It is located on Rt85 by the intersection of Daly Rd. Coordinates: 41.72611,-72.44056 (Gay City State Park)
Link for directions </p>
<p>http://maps.google.co...
<p>
Directions per the DEP website: From the South/New London area: Follow Route 85 north. Park entrance is 6.7 miles past the intersection with Route 66. From Glastonbury area: Take Route 85. Park entrance is 2.0 miles past the intersection with Route 94. From the North/Hartford & Massachusetts area: I-384 east to Exit 5. Take Route 85 south for 4.7 miles.
</p>
<p>Trail Map: http://www.ct.gov/dep...
<p>
RU Lost? Call/SMS Fred at 860-227-4027</p>
<p> </p>
<p><span style="color : #ff0000"><br /></span></p>
item.how_to_find_us: Pat and Todds dogs will be barking like crazy!!
item.name: Gay City State Park Easter Hike
